title: What medical students can learn about paediatric communication from children (Leeds Metropolitan University)
text: ( Source : Leeds Metropolitan University ) New methods to help medical students learn how to engage more effectively with children are being developed by researchers at Leeds Beckett University . In a new study, published in the journal Medical
